page.title: 02TOURISM
page.content: NEWCASTLETON{(TOURISM) For{tourists,}Newcastleton is near the Roman wall, Hermitage Castle, the Border towns and abbeys and some stately homes. The main events in Newcastleton are the{Music Festival,}on the first weekend in July,the{Agricultural show, on the last Saturday in August,and the Elliot Clan Gathering at Redheugh once every 4 years. There are 2{hotels,}"the Grapes" and "the Liddesdale". They do full board, bed and breakfast,morning coffee, bar lunches,teas and bar suppers and dinners.There are 2 restuarants, "the Copshaw Kitchen",which does carry out meals,and "the Dormouse",both on the main street.
